top.title: Gisaengchung (2019)
top.stars: Kang-ho Song, Lee Sun-kyun, Yeo-jeong Cho, Choi Woo-sik
top.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

top.title: Avengers: Endgame (2019)
top.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
top.synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

top.title: Joker (2019)
top.stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
top.synopsis: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

top.title: Toy Story 4 (2019)
top.stars: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Annie Potts, Tony Hale
top.synopsis: When a new toy called 'Forky' joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

top.title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood (2019)
top.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt, Margot Robbie, Emile Hirsch
top.synopsis: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.
top.image: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood.jpg

top.title: Spider-Man: Far from Home (2019)
top.stars: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal, Marisa Tomei
top.synopsis: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

top.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (2019)
top.stars: Jay Baruchel, America Ferrera, F. Murray Abraham, Cate Blanchett
top.synopsis: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek 'The Hidden World', a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

top.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum (2019)
top.stars: Keanu Reeves, Halle Berry, Ian McShane, Laurence Fishburne
top.synopsis: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

top.title: Rocketman (I) (2019)
top.stars: Taron Egerton, Jamie Bell, Richard Madden, Bryce Dallas Howard
top.synopsis: A musical fantasy about the fantastical human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

top.title: Alita: Battle Angel (2019)
top.stars: Rosa Salazar, Christoph Waltz, Jennifer Connelly, Mahershala Ali
top.synopsis: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is..
